thig5.1:0.3_0: As a certain he was felt
thig5.1:1.3_0: I have not found peace of mind,
thig5.1:1.4_0: even for as long as a finger-snap.
thig5.1:2.1_0: Failing to find peace of heart,
thig5.1:3.4_0: the elements of the sense fields,
thig5.1:4.2_0: I retired to a discreet place.
thig5.1:4.3_0: and I knew my past lives,
thig5.1:5.1_0: Comprehending the mind and mastery of knowledge,
thig5.1:5.4_0: and attained the ending of defilements.
thig5.1:5.5_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
